testcase.name: URL Shortener - Create Link › should handle network errors gracefully
My Links Page Tests › should load my-links page with header and footer components

My Links Page Tests › should have working navigation links in header

My Links Page Tests › should have modal dialogs for edit and delete
My Links Page Tests › should handle API errors gracefully
My Links Page Tests › should allow language switching

Profile Page Tests › should allow language switching
